snippet.title: ARK: Scorched Earth Expansion Pack!
snippet.description:
Stranded naked, dehydrated and starving on a fiery, drought-ridden desert world, players must immediately seek water, hunt for food, harvest new flora, craft new items, and build shelter from the extreme heat. Players who survive the harsh arid conditions can travel back and forth from the Scorched Earth map to the ARK: Survival Evolved main game, taking with them newly collected tools, weapons, and their new tamed creatures to impress their friends and dazzle their combatants.

ARK: Scorched Earth is a completely finished, polished new expansion pack, which retails for $19.99 on Steam PC/Mac/Linux/SteamOS and Xbox One. To play Scorched Earth, players already must own ARK: Survival Evolved which is on sale this week at 40% off the retail price for both Steam and Xbox One. 

To join our growing band of survivors, join Steam's Early Access Program on PC/Mac/Linux/SteamOS or Microsoft’s Game Preview on Xbox One to download the game. For the latest updates follow us on Twitter at https://www.twitter.com/survivetheark , like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/survivetheark/ , subscribe to us on YouTube, visit the Website at http://playark.com and our Community Hub at http://www.survivetheark.com plus watch us tame and train leviathan dinosaurs on https://www.twitch.tv/survivetheark
